abstract: The sale of the nonprofit domains to a private equity firm threatens the integrity of the open internet. ICANN should investigate.
lead_paragraph: Online commerce and for-profit activity have largely shaped the internet over the past 25 years, but a few important corners of the internet have remained staunchly nonprofit, retaining some of the internetâ€™s early charm and resistance to commercial interests. One of those corners is the .org top-level domain, the go-to domain for nonprofits and nongovernmental organizations looking to establish an affordable and reputable online presence.
keywords: Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers
